io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Panel

  • public class Panel
extends java.lang.Object
    A storage class for panels from a Nanoleaf Device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Panel(int id, int x, int y, int orientation, ShapeType shape)
      Creates a new panel.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Panel

        public Panel(int id,
             int x,
             int y,
             int orientation,
             ShapeType shape)
        Creates a new panel.
        Parameters:
        id - a unique, positive ID number
        x - the x coordinate position of the panel
        y - the y coordinate position of the panel
        orientation - the orientation of the panel in degrees
        shape - the shape type of the panel

      • getShape

        public ShapeType getShape()

        Gets the shape type of the panel.

        Note: this can normally be assumed for Aurora and Canvas devices, but Shapes devices may contain more than one panel type.

        Returns:
        the panel shape type

      • setShape

        public void setShape(ShapeType shape)

        Sets the shape type of the panel.

        Note: this can normally be assumed for Aurora and Canvas devices, but Shapes devices may contain more than one panel type.

        Parameters:
        shape - the panel shape type
